title: Didone - Critics welcome
content:
Hello all,  
the idea is, to develop a Didone with higher x-heights and some alternate letterforms, somewhere between Didot and Ambroise …  Would be great to get some feedback. Thank you

author: Viertelgeviert

comments.content: I think you should carry the equally weighted balance of X, x, n, u, m, w through to A, U, W, Y, y, where there's no longer much sense in the thin sides. Definitely the A if not the others. This may leave the distinctive v (and presumably V) in a category by itself but I think it's strong enough for that.
